definition: Matthew/St Matthew the evangelist/less common variant of 馬太|马太[Ma3 tai4] (preferred by the Catholic Church)
Matteo Ricci (1552-1610), Jesuit missionary and translator in Ming China

sentences.english: The passion according to Matthew begins with a sale.
sentences.chinese: 瑪竇福音所記載的受難史開始於買賣。
